name: Teleren Candy Rush Sensation
description:
Help May and the alien, zip, clear the area from mutant monsters from his planet, teleren. They have been created by an evil collector who plans on taking the earth for himself.

This game is a sequel to the original Candy Rush game with May having new abilities like:

- Manipulate road side sweets for power ups

- Greater visuals with a stunning 60FPS rate.

And a whole lot more

Test yourself and see how high your score can get.

During gameplay, press;

Shift button to pause

Enter button to go back.
